thing-type.label: HS1DS-Z Smart Door Sensor
thing-type.description: Smart Door Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtDoor/Window Contact.</p&gt <p&gtSame hardware as DOMUX DX1DS-Z.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPress a Func_Button 3 time in HS1DS-Z (Door Sensor), Green LED is Blinking 3 times within 1 second.</li&gt <li&gtIf Inclusion Process is successful, Green led will turn off. </li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPress a Func_Button 3 times quickly on HS1DS-Z.</li&gt <li&gtIf Exclusion Process is successful, Green led is Blinking 6 times, then turn off the HS1DS-Z.</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtWake up Notification is transmitted every 24 hours by default.</li&gt <li&gtWake up Notification is transmitted after Notification Report is Transmitted.</li&gt </ul&gt
